original: 史書上僅提及曾為劉璋部將，在赤壁戰後率眾投誠孫吳。周瑜上表孫權，建議由呂蒙掌管襲肅部曲，呂蒙上書回絕：「慕化遠來，於義宜益不宜奪也。」
text: The history books only mention that he was Liu Zhang's tribe, and he led the crowd to vote for Sun Wu after the Chibi War. Zhou Yu's cousin, Sun Quan, suggested that Lv Meng should take charge of the attacking trilogy. Lv Meng's letter refused
